title: for a building with height more than 32 m but upto 70 m the side and rear marginal open spaces shall not be less than 6 m and for a building with height more than 70 m the side and rear marginal open spaces shall not be less than 9 mand 12 m beyond 120 m subject to fulfillment of fire safety requirement as specified in these Regulations
